response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am offering it at a special price tailored to your interest. Considering the product's true value and your appreciation for it, I propose a transaction at $14,000. This offer reflects a fair compromise, allowing you to enjoy the benefits of this exceptional product while ensuring a profitable outcome for me. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of completing this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 14000}
